title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck – Dec 13 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck – Dec 13 2021
description:
Daily Review with Clay and Buck – Dec 13 2021:

The left politicizes extreme weather to push their climate change narrative and justify more government spending. A storm chaser and an environmental engineer explain the truth about tornadoes. Dinesh D’Souza explains why the Ghislaine Maxwell trial is the dog that didn't bark. What will Manchin do? Build Back Better is on the brink.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
